actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to establish an optional block grant program for States.
short_title: Food Stamp Optional Block Grant Act of 1985

summary.text: Food Stamp Optional Block Grant Act of 1985 - Amends the Food Stamp Act to permit States to choose a nutritional assistance block grant option in place of the existing food stamp program. Sets forth program provisions, including direct grants to Indian tribes or tribal organizations.

titles.title: Food Stamp Optional Block Grant Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to establish an optional block grant program for States.
